name: Deep Noise
description: Deep Noise is a top down survival horror game off a submersible sonar. A crew exploring Europa went missing and your vessel stopped working. You must find power, air, and the messages in the depths of Europa.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD graphics, or AMD Radeon Discrete DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 55 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and Above Processor: Intel or AMD dual core CPU Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Intel HD graphics, or AMD Radeon Discrete DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 55 MB available space
